contributions.message: For "EPISODE 5: Cauchy Dragons Stick Together!!", the visual strategy must be hyper-dynamic to engage Instagram users within the first few seconds. The "HUGE ANIMATED TITLE CARD" needs to be visually striking, incorporating elements of both 'epic effects' and the 'Family Guy' comedic style to immediately capture attention.  We should prioritize rapid-fire visual gags and clear, concise explanations of the mathematical concepts using on-screen text and quick, illustrative animations to maximize understanding and retention within the 40-second timeframe.

For "EPISODE 5: Cauchy Dragons Stick Together!!", we need to ensure the 3-second animated title card is exceptionally impactful with a blend of 'epic effects' and 'Family Guy' humor, immediately grabbing attention. The core of the video will be balancing the comedic synchronized swimming mishaps with clear, rapid visual explanations of Cauchy sequences and related theorems, all delivered with the dragon's witty coaching.

For 'EPISODE 5: Cauchy Dragons Stick Together!!', the audio must amplify the comedic synchronization, with the 3-second title card featuring a powerful, epic sound effect layered with subtle mathematical chimes. The dragon's dialogue needs sharp, punchy sound bites perfectly synced to visual gags of swimming mishaps and concept demonstrations, ensuring the 'epsilon distance' is audibly represented by subtle sound phasing or pitch shifts as team members get too close.
